entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023
